# NSRunContinuesResponse

**Global Variable**

Modal session is continuing (returned by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/runModalSession(_:)] only).

## Declaration

```swift
var NSRunContinuesResponse: Int { get }
```

## Constants

- **NSRunAbortedResponse**: Modal session was broken with [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/abortModal()].
- **NSRunStoppedResponse**: Modal session was broken with [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/stopModal()].
title: NSRunContinuesResponse
